name: Slime Game
description:
A small prototype game I made in Unity between semesters in University. I started it in 2015 but never finished it and didn't really know where to go with it. I decided recently I may as well polish it off a bit and put it up somewhere in case anyone wanted to see it.

You play as a slime and your goal is to eat the other slimes to grow bigger and to avoid getting eaten by slimes that are bigger than you.

Use WASD to move the character, the mouse to move the camera and hold space to power up a jump.
